response_parsed.title: Containerizing Edge Runtimes Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to containerize edge runtimes using FastAPI, a modern web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+. We will cover key points, code examples, version notes, and caveats.
key_points: Setting up Docker for Python development
Testing and deploying the containerized FastAPI application
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for using FastAPI
Uvicorn ASGI server (included in FastAPI) supports Python 3.7 and above
Docker version 20.10 or higher is recommended
caveats: Ensure your operating system has Docker installed before following this guide
This example assumes you have a basic understanding of Python, FastAPI, and Docker
Always test your containerized applications thoroughly before deploying to production
